price: Basi jiepushe nao. Siku atakapo ita mwitaji kuliendea jambo linalo chusha; .
arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ نُّكُرٍ
footnotes: Ewe Muhammad! Waachilie mbali hawa makafiri, nawe ngojea siku atapoita mwitaji wa Mwenyezi Mungu kuitia jambo ambalo nafsi inalichukia mno!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fatawalla ʿanhum yawma yadʿu al-dāʿi ilā shayin nukurin
